short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-forward gmail to scout catch-all & sign in to StockX and GOAT & NBA Topshot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps users set up auto-forwarding via gmail to their Scout catchall email, allowing them to import purchase history and expenses directly into Scout.
